description: Hummus toast is the new avocado toast and it is perfect with a jammy boiled egg on top.
keywords: Eggs on toast,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Egg,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Hummus Toast with Boiled Egg Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Brush the sourdough with oil and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side in a large frying pan on medium high heat. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Add the lemon juice and spinach to the pan and cook on a medium heat until wilted. Season to taste.

Place the eggs in a medium pan, cover with water and bring to the boil. Boil for 5-6 minutes, remove from the pan and add to a bowl of cold water for 2-3 minutes. Peel the eggs and slice each in half.
Spread hummus on each piece of sourdough, top with spinach, boiled egg halves, chilli flakes and salt and pepper.
